content: starfall socks by natural knits 1 pattern description no tricky techniques just soothing stitches and a little bit of starlight in every row a subtle elevated rib gives just enough texture to keep things interesting while letting your yarn variegated or solid take center stage the ribbed fabric means a snug flexible fit that s effortlessly comfortable perfect for knitters who want something relaxing with a little bit of visual interest nothing too complicated just a lovely rhythm and a nod to falling stars size small medium large finished measurements foot circumference 7 8 9 inches/ 17 8 20 3 22 8 cm foot length adjustable choose a size with approximately 1 inch/ 2 5 cm of negative ease in the foot circumference materials yarn pine and purl - classic sock 80% superwash merino 20% nylon 370 yards per 100 grams city of starlight colourway recommend needle size 1 set us #1 / 2 25 mm needles for knitting in the round gauge 32 sts/ 44 row = 4 inches/ 10 cm in stockinette pattern notes work from chart or written instructions according to your preference 2 heel toe up pattern heel will be worked over the previous 28 32 toe 36 sts using a german short row heel see using the turkish cast on method co 12 photo tutorial below and abbreviations and knit across 12 sts pm knit across 12 sts techniques for ds place a bor marker 24 sts turn work so wrong side is facing you round 1 knit until marker slip marker row 1 ws ds purl to end turn knit until bor row 2 rs ds knit until ds turn round 2 kfb knit until 2 sts before marker row 3 ws ds purl until ds turn kfb k1 slip marker kfb knit until 2 sts repeat row 2 and 3 until there are 9 11 12 before bor marker kfb k1 4 sts double sts at each end and 10 10 12 increased regular sts in the middle repeat round 1 and 2 until you have 56 64 72 sts continue working the row without turning and knit the 9 11 12 ds knit through both foot legs of the ds like a k2tog there are 28 32 36 sts for top of and knit until chart portion repeat next row bottom of foot divided by stitch markers from where you have marked of chart or work row 1 of chart or written instructions written instructions knit as established for 7 8 9 times over 28 32 36 sts knit until a total of 2 rounds knit 20 22 25 bor continue heel short row turn work so the knit as established continuing chart or wrong side is facing you written instructions row 2-4 repeat row row 4 ws ds p 11 11 13 turn 1-4 until 2 1 inches/ 5 3 cm from desired row 5 rs ds knit to ds k the ds and 1 st final length of foot mark
